snippet.title: Amazing Adventures the Lost Tomb
snippet.description:
In which I play another game from my collection that I must have gotten as part of a pack, Amazing Adventures the Lost Tomb. I can see someone actually playing this game but it is far too expensive being IMO poor value at £6.99 for a game from 2007, but better than Big Money! Deluxe which is the same price...

If you liked this, you might like:
Amazing Adventures Around the World (my vid here): http://youtu.be/ZZZSTP-btug
The Wizard's Pen (my vid here): http://youtu.be/j7EHYOyE3JU


Amazing Adventures the Lost Tomb on steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/3510/?snr=1_5_9__205
by Spin Top Games, published by PopCap Games
